title: Apple’s Senior Director of Global Privacy to speak on privacy and data protection at conference
content:
Jane Horvath, Apple’s Senior Director of Global Privacy, is speaking at the Computers, Privacy, and Data Protection (CPDP) conference. The event takes place May 23-25 in Brussels, Belgium, in which Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Meta are among the sponsors.

more…

The post Apple’s Senior Director of Global Privacy to speak on privacy and data protection at conference appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Jane Horvath, Apple’s Senior Director of Global Privacy, is speaking at the Computers, Privacy, and Data Protection (CPDP) conference.
